mapper.sql: orderNo, OwnersName, base_applicationName, insrntName, businessSource, jqpolicyStartDate, jqpolicyEndDate, sypolicyStartDate, syapplicationNo, sypolicyNo, jqpolicyNo, jqapplicationNo, sypolicyEndDate, vehicleName, taxPremium, jqPremium, syPremium, createTime, updateTime, userInforId, insuranceperinforId, taxinforId, vhlinforId, deliveryInforId, orderstate, deptNo, quoteNo, underWritingCode, jqPolicyStatus, syPolicyStatus, paymentinforId,totalPremium, deptAddress,agentCode,paymentMethod,lastImplementPage
mapper.select: SELECT orderNo, userInforId, vhlinforId FROM ludimb_baseinfor WHERE vhlinforId IN ( SELECT vhiinforId FROM ludimb_vhlinfor WHERE drvOwner = #{drvowner} AND phoneNo = #{phoneno} )
select * from ludimb_baseinfor where orderstate = 40 or orderstate = 30
mapper.insert: insert into ludimb_baseinfor (orderNo, OwnersName, base_applicationName, insrntName, businessSource, jqpolicyStartDate, jqpolicyEndDate, sypolicyStartDate, syapplicationNo, sypolicyNo, jqpolicyNo, jqapplicationNo, sypolicyEndDate, vehicleName, taxPremium, jqPremium, syPremium, createTime, updateTime, userInforId, insuranceperinforId, taxinforId, vhlinforId, deliveryInforId, orderstate, deptNo, quoteNo, underWritingCode, jqPolicyStatus, syPolicyStatus, paymentinforId) values (#{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownersname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{base_applicationname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insrntname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businesssource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jqpolicystartdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jqpolicyenddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sypolicystartdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{syapplicationno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sypolicyno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jqpolicyno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jqapplicationno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sypolicyenddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{vehiclename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxpremium,jdbcType=REAL}, #{jqpremium,jdbcType=REAL}, #{sypremium,jdbcType=REAL}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userinforid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{insuranceperinforid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taxinforid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vhlinforid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deliveryinforid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{quoteno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{underwritingcode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jqpolicystatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sypolicystatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentinforid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update ludimb_baseinfor
OwnersName = #{ownersname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
base_applicationName = #{base_applicationname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
insrntName = #{insrntname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
businessSource = #{businesssource,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jqpolicyStartDate = #{jqpolicystartdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
jqpolicyEndDate = #{jqpolicyenddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sypolicyStartDate = #{sypolicystartdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
syapplicationNo = #{syapplicationno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sypolicyNo = #{sypolicyno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jqpolicyNo = #{jqpolicyno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jqapplicationNo = #{jqapplicationno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sypolicyEndDate = #{sypolicyenddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
vehicleName = #{vehiclename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
taxPremium = #{taxpremium,jdbcType=REAL},
jqPremium = #{jqpremium,jdbcType=REAL},
syPremium = #{sypremium,jdbcType=REAL},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
userInforId = #{userinforid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
insuranceperinforId = #{insuranceperinforid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
taxinforId = #{taxinforid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vhlinforId = #{vhlinforid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
deliveryInforId = #{deliveryinforid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
orderstate = #{orderstate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
deptNo = #{deptno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
quoteNo = #{quoteno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
underWritingCode = #{underwritingcode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
syPolicyStatus = #{sypolicystatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jqPolicyStatus = #{jqpolicystatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paymentinforId = #{paymentinforid, jdbcType=INTEGER},
claimAdjustRsn = #{claimAdjustRsn, jdbcType=INTEGER},
applyTotalAdj = #{applyTotalAdj, jdbcType=INTEGER},
totalPremium = #{totalPremium, jdbcType=REAL},
deptAddress = #{deptAddress, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agentCode = #{agentCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paymentMethod = #{paymentMethod, jdbcType=INTEGER},
syquerySequenceNo = #{syquerySequenceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jqquerySequenceNo = #{jqquerySequenceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lastImplementPage = #{lastImplementPage, jdbcType=INTEGER},
origFlg = #{origFlg, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where orderNo = #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ludimb_baseinfor set OwnersName = #{ownersname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, base_applicationName = #{base_applicationname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, insrntName = #{insrntname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, businessSource = #{businesssource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jqpolicyStartDate = #{jqpolicystartdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, jqpolicyEndDate = #{jqpolicyenddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sypolicyStartDate = #{sypolicystartdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, syapplicationNo = #{syapplicationno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sypolicyNo = #{sypolicyno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jqpolicyNo = #{jqpolicyno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jqapplicationNo = #{jqapplicationno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sypolicyEndDate = #{sypolicyenddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, vehicleName = #{vehiclename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, taxPremium = #{taxpremium,jdbcType=REAL}, jqPremium = #{jqpremium,jdbcType=REAL}, syPremium = #{sypremium,jdbcType=REAL}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, userInforId = #{userinforid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, insuranceperinforId = #{insuranceperinforid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, taxinforId = #{taxinforid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vhlinforId = #{vhlinforid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deliveryInforId = #{deliveryinforid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, orderstate = #{orderstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deptNo = #{deptno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quoteNo = #{quoteno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, underWritingCode = #{underwritingcode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, syPolicyStatus = #{sypolicystatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jqPolicyStatus = #{jqpolicystatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paymentinforId = #{paymentinforid, jdbcType=INTEGER}, lastImplementPage = #{lastImplementPage, jdbcType=INTEGER}, totalPremium = #{totalPremium, jdbcType=REAL} where orderNo = #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ludimb_baseinfor
deliveryInforId = #{deliveryinforid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
orderstate = #{orderstate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where orderNo = #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update.foreach:
update ludimb_baseinfor
sypolicyNo = #{item.sypolicyno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jqpolicyNo = #{item.jqpolicyno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
syPolicyStatus = #{item.sypolicystatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jqPolicyStatus = #{item.jqpolicystatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orderstate = #{item.orderstate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
userInforId = #{item.userinforid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vhlinforId = #{item.vhlinforid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where orderNo = #{item.orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
